00024 namespace Omiscid {

00032 class RegisterThread : public Thread
00033 {
00034 public:
00035         /* @brief Create a new thread that will register a thread
00036          * give its number
00037          */
00038         RegisterThread(unsigned int MyNumber);
00039 
00040         /* @brief destructor (all destructor must be virtual !) */
00041         virtual ~RegisterThread();
00042 
00043         /* @brief The Run procedure of the thread, so what he must do */
00044         void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE Run();
00045         
00046         static AtomicCounter NbRegistered; 
00047         static Event NewServiceIsRegistered; 
00049 private:
00050         unsigned int Number; 
00051 };
00052 
00053 } // namespace Omiscid
00054 
00055 // Implementation of static members of RegisterThread
00056 AtomicCounter RegisterThread::NbRegistered; /* A static value to count registered services */
00057 Event             RegisterThread::NewServiceIsRegistered; /* A static value to count registered services */
00058 
00059         /* @brief Create a new thread that will register a thread
00060          * give its number
00061          */
00062 RegisterThread::RegisterThread(unsigned int MyNumber)
00063 {
00064         // Set my Number and Start
00065         Number = MyNumber;
00066 
00067     // Start
00068         StartThread();
00069 }
00070 
00071 /* @brief destructor (all destructor must be virtual !) */
00072 RegisterThread::~RegisterThread()
00073 {
00074         // nothing to do, the thread destructor will call StopThread
00075 }
00076 
00077 /* @brief The Run procedure of the thread, so what he must do */
00078 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE RegisterThread::Run()
00079 {
00080         // Ask to the service factory to create a Service. The service is not
00081         // register yet. We do not provide the service class, the default value 'Service'
00082         // will be used
00083         Omiscid::Service * pServ = ServiceFactory.Create( "RegisterThread" );
00084 
00085         // If something tricky occurred, exit
00086         if ( pServ == NULL )
00087         {
00088                 fprintf( stderr, "Could not register the service (my number is %d).\n", Number );
00089 
00090                 // Exit the thread
00091                 return;
00092         }
00093 
00094         // Just add a Variable of ConstantAccess that can not be modifies after the
00095         // service registration. Set its value to the number given in the constructor
00096         pServ->AddVariable( "Number", "interger", "My number", ConstantAccess );
00097         pServ->SetVariableValue( "Number", Number );
00098 
00099         // Start the service, i.e. register it and run all processing threads
00100         pServ->Start();
00101 
00102         // Say that there is one more RegisterThread Instance runnnig
00103         NbRegistered++;
00104         NewServiceIsRegistered.Signal();
00105 
00106         // Wait for some to ask the thread to stop
00107         WaitForStop();
00108 
00109         // Delete the constructed service and die (i.e existing the Run() function).
00110         delete pServ;
00111 }

00113 /* @brief Usage function */
00114 void RegisterAndSearchUsage(char * ProgramName)
00115 {
00116         fprintf( stderr, "%s is used to demonstrate register and search methods using OMiSCID.\n", ProgramName );
00117         fprintf( stderr, "Usage: %s [-n <Number of services>] [-proxy]\n", ProgramName );
00118         fprintf( stderr, "Default option values:\n" );
00119         fprintf( stderr, "          -n <Number of services>: from 2 to 100 services. Default is 20.\n" );
00120         fprintf( stderr, "          -proxy: activated DnsSdProxy features to speedup reserach process.\n", ProgramName );
00121         fprintf( stderr, "                  Not activated by default.\n\n", ProgramName );
00122         exit(-1);
00123 }
00124 
00125 /* @brief main program entry. No need to give parameter */
00126 int main(int argc, char*argv[] )
00127 {
00128         unsigned int i;
00129         int j;
00130 
00131         // Constant values
00132         // The number of service to register
00133         unsigned int NumberOfServicesToRegister = 20;
00134 
00135         // You can uncomment the following line to speedup searches
00136         DnsSdProxy * MyProxy = NULL;
00137         bool ProxyActivited  = false;
00138 
00139         // A variable to store pointers on RegisterThread
00140         RegisterThread * pRegThread;
00141 
00142         // parsing parameters, 0 is the program name
00143         for( j = 1 ; j < argc; j++ )
00144         {
00145                 if ( argv[j][0] != '-' )
00146                 {
00147                         fprintf( stderr, "Bad parameter '%s'. See Usage :\n\n", argv[j] );
00148                         RegisterAndSearchUsage(argv[0]);
00149                 }
00150 
00151                 // Do the user ask for help
00152                 if ( strcmp( argv[j], "-h" ) == 0 ||
00153                          strcmp( argv[j], "-help" ) == 0 ||
00154                          strcmp( argv[j], "--help" ) == 0 )
00155                 {
00156                         RegisterAndSearchUsage(argv[0]);
00157                 }
00158 
00159                 // Check the number of services
00160                 if ( strcmp( argv[j], "-n" ) == 0 )
00161                 {
00162                         j++;
00163                         if ( j >= argc )
00164                         {
00165                                 fprintf( stderr, "Missing parameter value for '%s' option. See Usage :\n\n", argv[j-1] );
00166                                 RegisterAndSearchUsage(argv[0]);
00167                         }
00168                         if ( sscanf( argv[j], "%d", &NumberOfServicesToRegister ) != 1 )
00169                         {
00170                                 fprintf( stderr, "Bad parameter value '%s' for '%s' option. See Usage :\n\n", argv[j], argv[j-1] );
00171                                 RegisterAndSearchUsage(argv[0]);
00172                         }
00173                         if ( NumberOfServicesToRegister < 2 || NumberOfServicesToRegister > 100 )
00174                         {
00175                                 fprintf( stderr, "You must set the number of service from 2 and to 100 maximum. See Usage:\n\n" );
00176                                 RegisterAndSearchUsage(argv[0]);
00177                         }
00178 
00179                         continue;
00180                 }
00181 
00182                 if ( strcmp( argv[j], "-proxy" ) == 0 )
00183                 {
00184                         if ( ProxyActivited == false )
00185                         {
00186                                 MyProxy = new DnsSdProxy;
00187                                 ProxyActivited = true;
00188                         }
00189                         continue;
00190                 }
00191 
00192                 fprintf( stderr, "Bad parameter '%s'. See Usage :\n\n", argv[j] );
00193                 RegisterAndSearchUsage(argv[0]);
00194         }
00195 
00196         // A simple list to store RegisterThread objects
00197         SimpleList<RegisterThread*> ListOfRegisterThreads;
00198 
00199         // Variables to Compute Statics
00200         unsigned int EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices = 0;
00201 
00202         // Print Welcome message
00203         printf( "This program is used to demonstrate register and search methods using OMiSCID.\n" );
00204         printf( "As it is ditributed, registering unique service and searching for services\n" );
00205         printf( "is a huge processing. See Accumulator/ClientAccumator examples for communication schema.\n\n" );
00206 
00207         printf( "** Session parameters **\nDnsSdProxy is%s activated.\n", ProxyActivited ? "" : " not"  );
00208         printf( "Number of service to register %d\n** **\n\n", NumberOfServicesToRegister ); 
00209 
00210 // Register services
00211         printf( "Start to register services.\n" );
00212 
00213         // Create an object to now when the total time
00214         // To register the services
00215         ElapsedTime TimeCounter;
00216         for( i = 1; i <= NumberOfServicesToRegister; i++ )
00217         {
00218                 // Create a new register service called
00219                 pRegThread = new RegisterThread(i);
00220                 // if ok
00221                 if ( pRegThread )
00222                 {
00223                         // add it to my list of threads
00224                         ListOfRegisterThreads.Add( pRegThread );
00225                 }
00226         }
00227 
00228         // Get number of waited services
00229         EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices = ListOfRegisterThreads.GetNumberOfElements();
00230 
00231         // Wait until all registered services are present
00232         printf( "Wait for service to be ready.\n" );
00233         for(;;)
00234         {
00235                 // Wait for all create thread to register their service
00236                 if ( RegisterThread::NbRegistered == EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices )
00237                 {
00238                         break;
00239                 }
00240 
00241                 // If not done, wait 100 ms macimum for a new service registration
00242                 RegisterThread::NewServiceIsRegistered.Wait(100);
00243         }
00244 
00245         printf( "=> %d service(s) are registered in %u ms.\n", EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices, TimeCounter.Get() );
00246 
00247 // Search for services, *can be done* in another process/computer over the network obvioulsly !
00248 
00249         // First, in order to serach for service, we need to create a service event if it is
00250         // not register. This service will ne be visible.
00251         Service * Searcher = ServiceFactory.Create( "Searcher" );
00252 
00253         if ( Searcher == NULL )
00254         {
00255                 // print there is a problem
00256                 fprintf( stderr, "Problem creating 'Searcher' service.\n" );
00257 
00258                 // Free all registred service
00259                 // 1er way to walk among the SimpleList
00260                 while( ListOfRegisterThreads.GetNumberOfElements() != 0 )
00261                 {
00262                         // Get and remove the first element in the list
00263                         // and it can not be NULL, delete it
00264                         delete ListOfRegisterThreads.ExtractFirst();
00265 
00266                         exit(-1);
00267                 }
00268         }
00269 
00270 // First, search only one service named RegisterThread and get a ServiceProxy for it
00271         printf( "Search for single RegisterThread service.\n" );
00272 
00273         // Reinit ElapsedTime object
00274         TimeCounter.Reset();
00275         // Search for a service, wait at max 5 s (5000 ms) to get an answer. We provide
00276         // A filter (automatically create by NameIs and automatically destroyed by FindService
00277         ServiceProxy * OneService = Searcher->FindService(NameIs("RegisterThread"), 5000);
00278 
00279         if ( OneService != NULL )
00280         {
00281                 printf( "=> service 'RegisterThread' found in %u ms.\n", TimeCounter.Get() );
00282 
00283                 // Delet
00284                 delete OneService;
00285         }
00286         else
00287         {
00288                 fprintf( stderr, "=> service 'RegisterThread' not found.\n" );
00289         }
00290 
00291 // Now Search for all services named RegisterThread and get a ServiceProxyList for Them
00292         printf( "Search all services named RegisterThread.\n" );
00293         
00294         // We need to a filters list, give a NameIs filter for each service
00295         ServiceFilterList ListOfFilters;
00296         for( i = 1; i <= EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices; i++ )
00297         {
00298                 ListOfFilters.Add( NameIs("RegisterThread") );
00299         }
00300 
00301         // Reset time counter
00302         TimeCounter.Reset();
00303         // Search for services, wait forever (no second parameter given) to get an answer
00304         // Get in return a ServiceProxy List
00305         ServiceProxyList * MultipleServices = Searcher->FindServices( ListOfFilters /*, 0 = default */ );
00306 
00307         // MultipleServices != NULL can not be null as we do not got out of FindServices without
00308         // an answer
00309         printf( "=> services found in %u ms.\n", TimeCounter.Get() );
00310 
00311         // Delete answer
00312         delete MultipleServices;
00313 
00314         // Empty the filter list to reset it
00315         ListOfFilters.Empty();
00316 
00317 // Now Search for all services named RegisterThread with a pair number and get a ServiceProxyList for Them
00318         printf( "Search for all RegisterThread services with a pair number.\n" );
00319         
00320         // We need to a filters list, give a NameIs filter for each service
00321         for( i = 2; i <= EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices; i += 2 )
00322         {
00323                 ListOfFilters.Add( And(NameIs("RegisterThread"),HasVariable("Number",i)) );
00324         }
00325 
00326         // Reset time counter
00327         TimeCounter.Reset();
00328         // Search for services, wait forever (no second parameter given) to get an answer
00329         // Get in return a ServiceProxy List
00330         MultipleServices = Searcher->FindServices( ListOfFilters /*, 0 = default */ );
00331 
00332         // MultipleServices != NULL can not be null as we do not got out of FindServices without
00333         // an answer
00334         printf( "=> services found in %u ms.\n", TimeCounter.Get() );
00335 
00336         // Print information about found service
00337         for( MultipleServices->First(); MultipleServices->NotAtEnd(); MultipleServices->Next() )
00338         {
00339                 // in order to write shorter lines below
00340                 ServiceProxy * pProxy = MultipleServices->GetCurrent();
00341                 cerr << pProxy->GetName() << " (" << pProxy->GetVariableValue("peerId") << ") is number "
00342                          << pProxy->GetVariableValue("Number") << endl;
00343         }
00344 
00345 // Now Search for specific service which is not a specific one
00346         MultipleServices->First();
00347         printf( "Search for single RegisterThread which is not %8.8x.\n", MultipleServices->GetCurrent()->GetPeerId() );
00348 
00349         // Reset time counter
00350         TimeCounter.Reset();
00351         // Search for services, wait forever (no second parameter given) to get an answer
00352         // Get in return a ServiceProxy List
00353         OneService = Searcher->FindService( Not(MultipleServices->GetCurrent()) );
00354 
00355         // MultipleServices != NULL can not be null as we do not got out of FindServices without
00356         // an answer
00357         printf( "=> service %8.8x found in %u ms.\n", OneService->GetPeerId(), TimeCounter.Get() );
00358 
00359         new char[2];
00360 
00361         // Delete last ServiceProxy
00362         delete OneService;
00363 
00364         // Delete answer
00365         delete MultipleServices;
00366 
00367 // Unregister service and close all connections
00368         printf( "Unregister service and close all connections.\n" );
00369         // Reset time counter
00370         TimeCounter.Reset();
00371         // Delete registered thread
00372         while( ListOfRegisterThreads.IsNotEmpty() )
00373         {
00374                 delete ListOfRegisterThreads.ExtractFirst();
00375         }
00376         printf( "=> done in %u ms.\n", TimeCounter.Get() );
00377 
00378         // delete the Search service
00379         delete Searcher;
00380 
00381         // delete the proxy is any
00382         if ( MyProxy != NULL )
00383         {
00384                 delete MyProxy;
00385         }
00386 
00387         // exit
00388         return 0;
00389 }
